SELECT
p.projectId AS projectId, p.title AS title, p.thumbnail AS thumbnail, p.endDate AS endDate, p.projectStatus AS projectStatus, p.goalAmount AS goalAmount, p.currAmount AS currAmount,
r.rewardId AS rewardId, r.rewardName AS rewardName, r.deliveryDate AS deliveryDate,
b.backingId AS backingId, b.amount AS amount, b.createdAt AS createdAt, b.backingStatus AS backingStatus,
bd.price AS price, bd.quantity AS quantity
FROM backingDetail bd JOIN backing b ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON bd.rewardId= r.rewardId JOIN project p ON r.projectId = p.projectId
WHERE b.userId=#{userId} AND p.projectId=#{projectId} AND r.rewardId=#{rewardId} AND b.backingId=#{backingId}

SELECT
p.projectId AS projectId, p.title AS title, p.thumbnail AS thumbnail, p.endDate AS endDate, p.projectStatus AS projectStatus,
r.rewardId AS rewardId, r.rewardName AS rewardName,
b.backingId AS backingId, b.backingStatus AS backingStatus, b.amount AS amount,
bd.price AS price, bd.quantity AS quantity
FROM backing b
JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON bd.rewardId = r.rewardId JOIN project p ON r.projectId = p.projectId
WHERE b.userId =#{userId} ORDER BY b.createdAt DESC

SELECT
u.userId, u.nickname, u.email,
c.creatorId, c.creatorName, c.profileImg,
p.projectId, p.title, p.thumbnail,
a.addrId, a.addrName, a.recipient, a.postalCode, a.roadAddr, a.detailAddr, a.recipientPhone, a.isDefault,
r.rewardId, r.rewardName, r.price, r.quantity, r.deliveryDate
FROM users u JOIN project p ON p.projectId = #{projectId} JOIN creator c ON c.creatorId = p.creatorId LEFT JOIN address a ON a.userId = u.userId LEFT JOIN reward r ON r.projectId = p.projectId WHERE u.userId = #{userId}

mapper.select: SELECT sum(backerCnt) FROM project WHERE CREATORID = #{creatorId}

SELECT DISTINCT u.userId, u.nickname,
b.amount, b.createdAt, p.projectId FROM project p JOIN creator c ON p.creatorId = c.creatorId JOIN reward r ON p.projectId = r.projectId JOIN backingDetail bd ON r.rewardId = bd.rewardId JOIN backing b ON bd.backingId = b.backingId JOIN users u ON b.userId = u.userId WHERE c.creatorId = #{creatorId} ORDER BY p.projectId, b.createdAt DESC

SELECT d.target_date AS createdAt, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT b.backingId), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS target_date FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.backingId, b.createdAt, p.creatorId FROM backing b JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON bd.rewardId = r.rewardId JOIN project p ON r.projectId = p.projectId ) b ON TRUNC(b.createdAt) = d.target_date AND b.creatorId = #{creatorId} GROUP BY d.target_date ORDER BY d.target_date

SELECT d.target_month AS createdAt, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT b.backingId), 0) AS count FROM (
SELECT ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -LEVEL + 1) AS target_month FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.backingId, b.createdAt, p.creatorId FROM backing b JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON bd.rewardId = r.rewardId JOIN project p ON r.projectId = p.projectId ) b ON TRUNC(b.createdAt, 'MM') = d.target_month AND b.creatorId = #{creatorId} GROUP BY d.target_month ORDER BY d.target_month

SELECT b.backingId, p.projectId, p.title, p.goalAmount, p.currAmount, p.endDate, p.thumbnail, b.userId, b.backingId, b.amount, b.createdAt, b.backingStatus, s.shippingStatus, c.creatorName, r.rewardId, r.rewardName, b.backingId, r.price, r.deliveryDate, bd.quantity FROM backing b JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON r.rewardId = bd.rewardId JOIN project p ON p.projectId =r.projectId JOIN shipping s ON s.backingId = b.backingId JOIN creator c ON c.creatorId = p.creatorId WHERE b.userId = #{userId} order by createdAt desc

SELECT b.backingId, p.projectId, p.title, p.goalAmount, p.currAmount, p.endDate, p.thumbnail, b.userId, b.backingId, b.amount, b.createdAt, b.backingStatus, s.shippingStatus, c.creatorName FROM backing b JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON r.rewardId = bd.rewardId JOIN project p ON p.projectId = r.projectId JOIN shipping s ON s.backingId = b.backingId JOIN creator c ON c.creatorId = p.creatorId WHERE b.userId = #{userId}

SELECT b.backingId, b.userId, b.amount, b.createdAt, b.backingStatus, py.method, py.cardCompany, s.shippingStatus, s.trackingNum, s.shippedAt, s.deliveredAt, p.title, p.thumbnail, a.addrName, a.recipient, a.postalCode, a.roadAddr, a.detailAddr, a.recipientPhone, c.creatorId FROM backing b JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON r.rewardId = bd.rewardId JOIN project p ON p.projectId = r.projectId JOIN shipping s ON s.backingId = b.backingId JOIN creator c ON p.creatorId = c.creatorId JOIN address a ON a.addrId = s.addrId JOIN payment py ON py.backingId = b.backingId JOIN creator c ON c.creatorId = p.creatorId WHERE b.userId = #{userId}

SELECT b.backingId, b.userId, b.amount, b.createdAt, b.backingStatus, py.method, py.cardCompany, s.shippingStatus, s.trackingNum, s.shippedAt, s.deliveredAt, p.title, p.thumbnail, a.addrName, a.recipient, a.postalCode, a.roadAddr, a.detailAddr, a.recipientPhone, c.creatorName, r.rewardId, r.rewardName, r.price, r.deliveryDate, bd.quantity FROM backing b JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON r.rewardId = bd.rewardId JOIN project p ON p.projectId = r.projectId JOIN shipping s ON s.backingId = b.backingId JOIN address a ON a.addrId = s.addrId JOIN payment py ON py.backingId = b.backingId JOIN creator c ON c.creatorId = p.creatorId WHERE b.userId = #{userId}
